articles.author: Reuters Staff
articles.title: EU regulator advices against second AstraZeneca shot in those with blood clots - Reuters
articles.description: Europe's drug regulator said on Friday AstraZeneca's COVID-19 vaccine must not be given to anyone who has had blood clots with low blood platelets after receiving the shot, and that patients must be monitored for signs within three weeks of vaccination.
articles.content:
By Reuters Staff

articles.title: Scientists in Asia resumed work far quicker than western counterparts, international COVID lockdown - EurekAlert
articles.description: Researchers in China, Japan, and Singapore were able to resume research much quicker than their counterparts in the US and Europe after the first covid lockdowns, results of a new international survey suggest.
